content:
Get-AzureRmWebAppMetrics

Gets Azure Web App metrics.

Syntax

Get-AzureRmWebAppMetrics [-ResourceGroupName] <String> [-Name] <String> [-Metrics] <String[]>
 [-StartTime] <DateTime> [[-EndTime] <DateTime>] [-Granularity] <String> [-InstanceDetails]
Get-AzureRmWebAppMetrics [-WebApp] <Site> [-Metrics] <String[]> [-StartTime] <DateTime> [[-EndTime] <DateTime>]
 [-Granularity] <String> [-InstanceDetails]

Description

The Get-AzureRmWebAppMetrics gets Web App metrics.

Examples

Example 1

PS C:\> Get-AzureRmAppServicePlanMetrics -ResourceGroupName "Default-Web-WestUS" -Name "ContosoWebApp" -StartTime 2016-11-30T22:00:00Z -EndTime 2016-11-30T22:30:00Z -Granularity PT1M -Metrics ["Requests"]

This command gets Requests of the Web App ContosoWebApp per minute(PT1M - Poll Time 1 minute) between StartTime and EndTime

Parameters

-EndTime

End Time in UTC

Type:DateTime
Required:False
Position:4
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Granularity

Granularity

Type:String
Required:True
Position:5
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-InstanceDetails

Instance Details

Type:SwitchParameter
Required:False
Position:6
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Metrics

Metrics as a string array

Type:String[]
Required:True
Position:2
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Name

WebApp Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:1
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ResourceGroupName

Resource Group Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-StartTime

Start Time in UTC

Type:DateTime
Required:True
Position:3
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-WebApp

WebApp object

Type:Site
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False

Related Links

  • Get-AzureRmWebAppCertificate
